description: This file contains CMake functions and macros used for managing build configurations, target dependencies, and packaging within a CMake-based project. It includes utilities for handling target properties, dependencies, and installation procedures related to CMake config files, package configs, and find modules.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a list variable in CMake.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Derives the library name and directory from a given library path for linking purposes.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves the link libraries and directories for a given target, resolving imported and normal targets.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects all compile definitions (preprocessor directives) for a target, including interface dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Collects compile options (flags) for a target and its interface dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Retrieves include directories for a target, resolving interface directories and path adjustments.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs a CMake package configuration file for a target, including versioning and dependencies.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs a pkg-config (pc) file for a target, including compile options, defines, and include dirs.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs custom CMake find modules (*.cmake files) from a specified directory or files.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Outputs all CMake property names supported by cmake --help-property-list.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Prints all properties for a specified target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a string with an ASCII unit separator to make it safe for CMake variables.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates a compatible interface target with linkage, headers, and installation properties, facilitating legacy or simplified consumers.
